```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(scales)

diamonds %>%
  ggplot(aes(carat, price, color = clarity)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  facet_wrap( ~ cut, scales = "free_x") +
  theme_light() + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format()) +
  labs(
    title = "50,000 Diamonds",
    caption = "Comparing the size, price, and clarity of 50,000 diamonds"
  )
```
